entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
